page.title: 09MILL FARM, NEWTON
page.content: Mr.J.Sawford farms Mill Farm with his family. The mixed farm covers 360 acres consisting of 72 acres of oil seed rape, 83 acres of Winter Wheat and 205 acres of grass. Mr Sawford has 96 milking cows and other cattle. He sends the milk to Unigate Dairy, Fenstanton. His cows produce 6,500 litres of milk per year. There are 400 sheep at Mill Farm. Their wool is sent to Market Harborough. Mr Sawford sends his sheep to market at Thrapston and his cattle to Kettering. Mrs Sawford cares for the poultry. She gathers about 36 eggs a day, some of these are sold. There are 2 working dogs and 12 cats to control vermin. The family has a goose, 2 cats and 2 goats as pets.
